name: ScienceDirect Dark
description:
Gives you dark mode for ScienceDirect (Elsevier) Journals

This is a work in progress but I felt I should upload it nonetheless. If you feel like contributing please see my GitHub page [here](https://github.com/alapo/Stylus-ScienceDirectDark)

https://github.com/alapo/Stylus-ScienceDirectDark
additional_info: Much of the coding was borrowed from the Stack Overflow Dark theme.
